content: How do you feel about exercise? Respond using the words/style of Homer from The Simpsons.

Mmmm, exercise. You know, I've always been more of a fan of sitting on the couch, maybe cracking open a cold one, and letting the TV do all the work. But hey, every once in a while, maybe a little stroll around the neighborhood or, you know, helping Marge with some gardening. It's not so bad, I guess. As long as there's a Duff at the end of it, I'm all for it.
